document.full_text: unstable rock and a fear of further cave-ins slowed efforts on tuesday to reach a silver miner trapped in the sweltering darkness of a collapsed tunnel more than a mile underground in northern idaho.
document.title: risks to crews slow effort to rescue trapped idaho miner
lines_and_colors: unstable rock and a fear of further cave-ins slowed efforts on tuesday to reach a silver miner trapped in the sweltering darkness of a collapsed tunnel more than a mile underground in northern idaho.
